document_data.title: Gates of Neverdeath
document_data.author: [[Erik Scott de Bie]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Gates of Neverdeath''''' is an adventure module for the D&D Game Day in Summer 2011, for the 4th-edition of ''[[Dungeons & Dragons]]''. This adventure was released as a prelude for ''[[Lost Crown of Neverwinter]]''.

{{Quote|''The task seems easy enough: Accompany a mysterious traveler and her equally mysterious package from [[Waterdeep]] to [[Neverwinter]].''

''In the Jewel of the North, tasks are seldom easy, though. News travels fast, and the [[Red Wizards of Thay]] have learned of the traveler and the object she carries. Now, a [[necromancer]] readies an ambush for the [[adventurer]]s and their ward, intent on stealing the item for its own sinister purpose.''

''Gates of Neverdeath is a [[Dungeons & Dragons]] Game Day adventure, and is a prequel to  [[Lost Crown of Neverwinter]], the summer 2011 season of the [[D&D Encounters]] official play program. The adventure comes with one full-color battle map, and two ready to play encounters.''}}
